Title: Gulzar, a specialist in poetry for children
Content: In the early 90s, as a pre-teen keeping my fantasy world alive with Doordarshan's cartoon characters, two names I got instantly enamoured of were ‘Gulzar’ and ‘Vishal’. Mowgli of Jungle Book was for
Author: Hari Narayan
